info.title: Injective Guilds Service
info.description: HTTP server for the Trading guilds query

get.description: Get a single guild base on ID
Get master address of given guild

post.description: Enter the guild: Should supply public_key, message, signature in base64

delete.description: Enter the guild: Should supply public_key, message, signature in base64

get.description: Get all members a given guild (include default member)
Get current account portfolios snapshots all the time
